    I won't know you've been here unless you tell me. Let me know what you think about this either via email or webmention. I would love to read about your perspective.

I'm Zinzy Waleson Geene, a Non-binary Senior UX researcher and designer from Amsterdam. This is a quiet street on the Internet, a place for soft stances, lived experiences, and critical notes on the things I hold dear. Thank you for your time.
